summary: Add a new Armor to game.
descriptionHtml:
Added a new ligth armor to game which can be crafted at the forge under the leather section.
Cuirass: 2 lines, 3 leather and 6 leatherstripes
Braves: 1 leather and 1 leatherstripe
Boots: 2 leather and 1 leatherstripe
Hood: 2 leather and 1 leatherstripe

Basicstats:
- Cuirass: 30 between elven and glass armor
- braves:  15
- boots    20
- hood     15

Please report Bugs and ideas for further versions!

If you want the alternative textures of the thievesguildarmorparts (pauldrons, overbelt, gloves and boots) please download Valstein0 great mod: Thieves Guild Major Retex here at the nexus
(link: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2577) otherwise you will only have the standard thievesguild textures until i retexture them
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2577

Features:

- Male and Female Armor full set
- alternative colored versions
- Standalone Version
- craftable and upgradeable

Planed:

- female version 80%
- more versions (different colour) 50%
- some minor updates of the armor meshes

Bugs:

- some problem with the skin and models

Install: Just place everything into your skyrim folder or use NMM

If you like this one, try out my other mod: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10097

try out SharanisKhan french translation of the mod http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11660
author: nomo89
